function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on urban design and public spaces, with potential for increased risk of disease transmission in crowded urban environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population density in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Household size and family structure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical pandemics like cholera, typhoid, tuberculosis, and the third plague pandemic have influenced the design and infrastructure of the built environment, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The current health crisis, particularly the covid-19 pandemic, has directly impacted urban planning and architecture, necessitating the development of built environments with enhanced security measures to prevent the spread of infections and diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research conducted to imagine how the antivirus-built environment would look","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social distancing and quarantine as a design problem in the post-pandemic era","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical precedents of infectious diseases driving urban renewal and architectural design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreading in built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragility of the real world","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus attacks on digital and built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volumes processed in rna extraction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible higher covid-19 prevalence in the community than reported through clinical surveillance.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of estimating covid-19 prevalence based on sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in sewage.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage data serving as a sensitive tool for early warning of increasing virus circulation in the population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scatter in combined data of all wwtp due to variations in virus rna recovery and concentration in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of virus in sewage before reported covid-19 cases in the population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in sars-cov-2 rna concentrations in city sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage and its correlation with reported covid-19 cases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in sensitivity of primer/probe sets for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate recovery efficiency of coronavirus in wastewater samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of non-enveloped f+ rna phages for estimating coronavirus recovery efficiency","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable quantification of sars-cov-2 in sewage due to qrt-pcr assay limitations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection and quantification of sars-coronavirus-2 rna in sewage samples.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proxy for the period prevalence of covid-19 in the cities served by the wwtp.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recovery efficiency of f-specific rna phages in purification and concentration steps.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential underreporting of covid-19 cases due to limited testing of individuals with severe symptoms.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage surveillance as a sole early warning system for re- emergence of covid-19 in cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in domestic wastewater suggesting circulation of covid-19 in communities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via respiratory droplets and fomites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in sewage and potential for health risks to workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increas in virus load in sewer systems due to circulation of the virus in the population","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of controversial health guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data duration less than four months in the selected studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-peer-reviewed manuscripts included in the analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider migration patterns and isolation policies in the studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and limitations in understanding the impact of climatic variables on the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population density contributing to faster spread of the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underreporting of new cases of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of peer review for included studies in the systematic review","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cold air causing vasoconstriction of the respiratory tract and weakening of the immune system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dry cold air making the nasal mucosa prone to small ruptures, creating opportunities for virus invasion","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low or extremely cold temperature playing a positive role in reducing the transmission of coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in tropical climates due to heat intolerance of the virus and breakdown of lipid bilayer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seasonality and environmental influences on the spread of respiratory pathogens","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased viral stability and reproduction in cold temperatures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
